name: ServiceProcess
description: Represents a since OS process running on the Instance

parentPid.description: The OS process ID of the parent of this process (eg: *NIX PPID)

pid.description: The OS process ID of this process (eg: *NIX PID)

listeningSockets.description: List of addresses/ports this process is listening on

isTrackingObjects.description: Indicates if object-tracking is turned on for this process

isProfiling.description: Indicates if cpu-profiling is turned on for this process

isTracing.description: Indicates if tracing is turned on for this process

debugger.description: Status of DevTools Debugger in this process

watchdogTimeout.description: Watchdog timeout, in milliseconds. (0 = watchdog disabled)

watchdogStallout.description: Watchdog stallout, in stall counts. (0 = stall disabled)

isSnapshotting.description: Indicates if a heap-dump is being performed on this process

startTime.description: Timestamp when this process was started

stopTime.description: Timestamp when this process was stopped or killed

stopReason.description: The signal or reason this process exited
